About MIAMOR

MIAMOR is the world's first platform that combines meaningful dating with financial opportunities. We believe that love and prosperity go hand in hand, and we've created a unique ecosystem where finding your soulmate can also build your financial future.

Founded in 2024, our mission is to revolutionize how people approach relationships and financial growth. Through our innovative reward system, couples earn together while building lasting connections that matter.
